TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PickResult extends System.Object

Docs.summary: File name of the picked file.
Docs.remarks: This contains the file name only part of the picked file. It can be used to determine the file type.

Docs.summary: File URI of the picked file.
Docs.remarks: Depending on the platform, this property may contain an URI or a path to the file that was selected by the user. On Android, most often it contains a content:// URI, since the origin of the picked file is a content provider and may not exist as a physical file on storage at all. On iOS the file may be removed from the app's "Inbox" folder and may not be available anymore. The best way to access the picked file's data is always to use GetStream().

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Stream GetStream() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets stream to access the picked file.
Docs.returns: A stream object to access the picked file.
Docs.remarks: Note that on some platforms (e.g. Android, iOS) the stream object returned from this method often is the only way to access the actual data of the picked file. Be sure to dispose of the stream object when finished, e.g. by using a "using" statement.
